## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPDI10, ATPDIL2-2, PDI10, PDIL2-2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA PROTEIN DISULFIDE ISOMERASE 10, PDI-like 2-2, PROTEIN DISULFIDE ISOMERASE, PDI-like 2-2
- **Description:**   PDI-like 2-2;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
